sentences.en: Adaptive strategies may often evolve, such as the biochemical polymorphisms of blood and serum groups.
sentences.cn: 适应策略也常常进化, 例如:血型和血清的生化多形现象就是这样的.

sentences.en: All types of vagotomy cause an increase of basal and postprandial serum gastrin levels.
sentences.cn: 所有类型的迷走神经切断术,均产生空腹和餐后血清促胃液素水平的升高.

sentences.en: Antibodies were part of the r - globulin fraction of serum.
sentences.cn: 抗体是血清r - 球蛋白的一部分.

sentences.en: For a diagnosis of tularemia you need a fourfold increase in serum antibody levels.
sentences.cn: 要诊断是兔热症,她的血清抗体等级需要有4个部分的增长.

sentences.en: In a word, serum hepatitis was also infectious.
sentences.cn: 换句话说, 血清性肝炎也是传染性的.

sentences.en: In rats exposed to CCl _ 4 , serum LDH _ 5 and total LDHwere increased.
sentences.cn: 结果表明:四氯化碳组血清LDH、 LDH_5明显升高.

sentences.en: Method: ELISA had been used to determine the serum prolactin levels.
sentences.cn: 方法: 采用ELISA方法测定血清催乳素水平.

sentences.en: Methods: Cell culture in serum - free medium , indirect immunofluorescence cytochemistry were used.
sentences.cn: 方法: 采用无血清细胞培养技术, 间接免疫细胞化学染色法.

sentences.en: Scientists worry about vaccines that depend on antigens collected from the serum of carriers.
sentences.cn: 科学家们对依靠从带病者血清中提取的抗原作为疫苗很不放心.

sentences.en: The only available hyperimmune serum was of equine origin.
sentences.cn: 唯一可得到的超免疫血清来源于马.

sentences.en: The serum is available to the general public.
sentences.cn: 一般公众均可获得血清.

sentences.en: The serum is vitiated byexposure to the air.
sentences.cn: 血清暴露在空气中已变质.

sentences.en: The varied serum potassium change had varied ECG changes.
sentences.cn: 不同程度的血钾变化在心电图上也有不同的特征表现.

sentences.en: They are determining the serum - protein and cholesterol levels.
sentences.cn: 他们正在测定血清蛋白和胆固醇的浓度.

words.tran_cn: [免疫]血清；浆液；免疫血清；乳清；树液

phrases.tran_cn: 牛血清白蛋白；牛血清清蛋白
血清白蛋白；血清清蛋白

trans.tran_en: a liquid containing substances that fight infection or poison, that is put into a sick person’s blood
